title: Walkman
summary: Walkman (stylized WALKMAN) is a brand of portable audio players manufactured by Sony. The original Walkman, released in 1979, was a portable cassette player that allowed people to listen to music of their choice on the move.[2][3] Its popularity made "walkman" an unofficial term for personal stereos of any producer or brand.[4] By 2010, when production stopped, Sony had built about 200Â million cassette-based Walkmans.[5]
